fullText: James Ijames's Pulitzer Prize-winning play is a raucous, irreverent, and deeply felt reimagining of Hamlet set at a family barbecue in the American South.
dtliExcerpt: James Ijames's Pulitzer Prize-winning play is a raucous, irreverent, and deeply felt reimagining of Hamlet set at a family barbecue in the American South.
